definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食盐，柠檬汁，孜然粉，橄榄油和胡椒粉调味。

sentences.english: Olive oil is basic to paella.
sentences.chinese: 橄榄油是海鲜饭的基本佐料。

sentences.english: Compressing the bottom of a ceramic olive oil bottle eliminates S cracks.
sentences.chinese: 压缩了陶瓷橄榄油瓶底部裂缝消除S。

sentences.english: A touch extra virgin olive oil around Bolognese and pasta.
sentences.chinese: 在肉酱和面条上撒些初榨橄榄油。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, heat remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in the heart cocotte over medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 同时，用中火和桃心铸铁锅加热另外一汤勺橄榄油。

sentences.english: Combine olive oil, lemon juice and dry ingredients to create marinade.
sentences.chinese: 将橄榄油，柠檬汁和干的调料混合在一起，做成腌汁。

sentences.english: The mist in the background is a cloud of laser-illuminated olive oil droplets. More Photos »
sentences.chinese: 背景中的薄雾为激光照亮的橄榄油滴形成的云状物。

sentences.english: Olive oil is generally best within the year in which it was made.
sentences.chinese: 生产期一年之内的橄榄油一般来说是最好的。

sentences.english: Drizzle with olive oil and champagne vinegar for a light and tasty dressing.
sentences.chinese: 少少淋上橄榄油和香槟醋和可口的敷料。

sentences.english: Heat some oil in pan, pan-fry the veal in parma ham until color changed.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔肉及巴马火腿下锅用橄榄油煎香，颜色转深即熟。

sentences.english: Slowly drizzle in the olive oil with one hand while vigorously whisking the mixture with the other.
sentences.chinese: 一手缓缓淋入橄榄油，一手不停地快速搅打。

sentences.english: Green soaps sold as olive oil soap are manufactured from olive pomace oil.
sentences.chinese: 市场上一些绿颜色的橄榄皂则是用橄榄油渣制作而成。

sentences.english: Rip all the basil over it, correct the seasoning, and drizzle with good extra-virgin olive oil.
sentences.chinese: 加入撕碎的罗勒，调味，最后淋上特级橄榄油。

sentences.english: Add 1tbsp olive oil into the pan, add risotto and briefly fry for 30secs.
sentences.chinese: 下1汤匙橄榄油至镬中，加入意大利米略炒30秒。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 同时，在煮锅中用中火加热橄榄油。

definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
